info.title: Liability Summary Details
info.description:
# Usage Terms
These interfaces are business-critical interfaces for HMRC and DWP, supporting thousands of staff - all consumption, or change in consumption levels, should be registered and fully approved (see Registered Consumers below).

## Version Log
| Version | Date       | Author               | Description   |
|---------|------------|----------------------|---------------|
| 0.0.1   | 03/03/2024 | NPS Development Team | Initial Draft |
| 0.0.2   | 17/03/2025 | NPS Development Team | Updated specs for HMRC Comments and consistency across all APIs  |
| 1.0.0   | 21/03/2025 | NPS Development Team | Spec baselined|
| 2.0.0   | 01/05/2025 | NPS Development Team | Specs aligned across HIP and Application, removed 403.1 remnants   |
| 2.0.1   | 02/06/2025 | NPS Development Team | Hyphenated Search Category Parameter for HIP |
| 2.0.2   | 06/06/2025 | NPS Development Team | Replaced Additional special characters search Category Parameter for HIP | 
| 2.0.3   | 01/10/2025 | NPS Development Team | Updated 422 error, updated office details, updated regex patter for homeResponsibilitiesProtectionBenefitReference and changed liabilityType from EnumLiabtp to EnumHyphenatedLiabtp  |
| 2.0.4   | 02/06/2025 | NPS Development Team | Added  Replacement Credits for Parents and Carers to EnumLiabtp, govUkJobRole removed maxLength: 20, govUkOriginatorId minLength: 3,  errorResourceObj_400, maxLength: 128|

x-integration-catalogue.short-description: Liability Summary details associated with a person

get.description:
# Purpose
This API is used to retrieve an individual's liability summary for a given tax year from NPS (National Insurance & PAYE Service). This forms part of the NI Contributions Processing. Data may be filtered using liabilityStartDate and/or liabilityEndDate. More processing only required for NI processing, callbackURL will not be returned down PAYE Processing.

# Volumes & Registered Consumers
This API is consumed by the following 'Registered Consumers' who would all need to be impacted when a new consumer with an associated new load first registers to use the service, or an uplift is required to the API. Each 'Registered Consumer' below will receive an additional Security Spec. document that outlines how to connect to the various environments as well as any consumer-specific authorisation/authentication details - this is unique to their connection.

| Consumer | Average API Calls Per Hour | Peak API Calls Per Hour | Peak TPS |
|----------|----------------------------|-------------------------|----------|
| XXXX XXX | xxx                        | xxx                     | xxx      |

*TPS = Transactions per second

## Request Data Structure & Payload Details

422_TRNNotAllowed.description: This error is only returned for certain consumers.

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.
correlationId.name: correlationId

govUkOriginatorId.description: Identity of the Originating System that made the API call.
govUkOriginatorId.name: gov-uk-originator-id

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.
govUkOrganisationId.name: gov-uk-organisation-id

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.
govUkUserId.name: gov-uk-user-id

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.
govUkUserName.name: gov-uk-user-name

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.
govUkJobRole.name: gov-uk-job-role

resourceGroupId.description: A unique identifier for a HMRC Resource Group.
resourceGroupId.name: resource-group-id

Identifier.name: identifier
Identifier.description: The identifier of which could be either a Temporary Reference Number (TRN) or a National Insurance Number (NINO).

LiabilitySearchCategoryHyphenated.description: The type of liability associated with the individual's tax affairs.
LiabilitySearchCategoryHyphenated.name: searchCategory

LiabilityStart.description: The date on which this liability started.
LiabilityStart.name: liabilityStartDate

LiabilityEnd.description: The date on which this liability ended.
LiabilityEnd.name: liabilityEndDate

LiabilityTypeQuery.description: The type of liability associated with the individual's tax affairs.
LiabilityTypeQuery.name: type

LiabilityOccurrenceNumberQuery.description: Denotes the number of times a particular liability has occurred on an individual's account.
LiabilityOccurrenceNumberQuery.name: occurrenceNumber

EarliestLiabilityStartDate.description: Denotes the earliest liability start date to retrieve data for.
EarliestLiabilityStartDate.name: earliestStartDate

enum: SOUTH GEORGIA AND SOUTH SANDWICH ISLAND
PAYMENT OF ARREARS BY ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER
PSEUDO SUBJECT TO NORMAL COLLECTION ACTION
VOLUNTARY CLASS 2 ABROAD BY EMPLOYERS SCHEDULE
VOLUNTARY CLASS 3 ABROAD BY EMPLOYERS SCHEDULE
Replacement Credits for Parents and Carers
INPUT/REMOVAL OF CONTRIBUTION/CREDIT OF RRE LAPSED BY LO
PERIOD CLOSED DUE TO CLAIM FOR BENEFIT
RRE LAPSED BY CHANGE IN MARITAL STATUS
RRE LAPSED DUE TO FAILURE OF 2 YEAR CHECK
Missing HRP letter not sent - awarded
Missing HRP letter not sent - refused

resourceGroupIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for a HMRC Resource Group.

identifierParameter.description: The identifier of which could be either a Temporary Reference Number (TRN) e.g. 00A00000 or a National Insurance Number (NINO) e.g. AA000001A.

errorResponse_400.description: Array of Error Response Failure Object in Error Response.
errorResponse_400.title: Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

errorResponse_403_ForbiddenOnly.description: Error Response Payload for this API
errorResponse_403_ForbiddenOnly.title: Forbidden Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

code.description: The error code representing the Forbidden Error.

errorResponseOverrideable.description: Error Response Payload for this API
errorResponseOverrideable.title: Error Response

askUser.description: Indicator of whether the user can choose to override a failure.

fixRequired.description: Indicator of whether the error requires user intervention to remediate errors.

workItemRaised.description: Indicator of whether an NI work item has been raised for the errors provided.

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure passed from NPS.

code.description: The error code representing the error that has occurred passed from NPS.

liabilityEnd.description: The date on which this liability ended.

liabilityType.description: The type of liability associated with the individual's tax affairs.

liabilityOccurrenceNumber.description: Denotes the number of times a particular liability has occurred on an individual's account.

earliestLiabilityStartDate.description: Denotes the earliest liability start date to retrieve data for.

callbackURL.description: A URL in the response body that redirects the user to call the next set of data based on the prepared URL. This will only be populated if the call has not returned all the relevant data and another call is required.

GetLiabilitySummaryResponseHIP.description: Success response payload for this API.

MPPCLiabilityAndEmploymentDetailsHIP.description: Contains employment status and liability details associated with an individual.

employmentStatusForLiability.description: Denotes the individual's employment status for a given liability.

MPPCResponseLiabilityDetailsHIP.description: Contains liability details associated with an individual.

country.description: The country that the address resides in.

awardAmount.description: Denotes the amount of the award.
